full_summary:
### Video Recording System for Zebrafish Research
#### Solicitation Number:
WS4297887359

#### Solicitation Status:
This solicitation is expire since December 21, 2023.

#### Brief Description:
Health Canada is seeking a video recording system to support zebrafish research for the development and testing of new methods for zebrafish embryo-based approaches.

#### Required Capabilities:
* Non-invasive analysis of zebrafish larvae
* High-resolution video recording
* Analysis of endpoints related to zebrafish embryos and larvae (activity, cardiology, morphology)

#### Tender Details:
* Solicitation Date: December 5, 2023
* Closing Date and Time: December 21, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* Contract Start Date: December 21, 2023
* Contract End Date: March 28, 2025

#### Contracting Entity:
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Address:
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

#### End User Entity:
Department of Health (HC)

#### Building Name:
Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9, Canada

#### Contact Information:
Wijaya Putri, Yessica Karnali (SPAC/PSPC)  
Email: [yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  
Phone: x (No phone number provided)  
Fax: x (No fax number provided)

#### Solicitation Documents:
Available on Ariba Discovery at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18196519?extsite=MTgxOTY1MTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18196519?extsite=MTgxOTY1MTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
